mapper.select: select * from category where value is null

with c as (select * from category where value is null), i as (select * from category_interest where member_no = #{member_no}) select i.category_interest_no, c.category_no, i.member_no, c.name from c left join i on c.category_no = i.category_no
mapper.delete: delete from category_interest where category_no = #{category_no} and member_no = #{member_no}
